explanation: [0-0] A hand holds an ornament of a ship sailing in transparent resin waves. The background is a fish tank with a black fish, a pink fish, and an orange fish swimming inside. There is blue light illuminating the fish tank.
[0-2] The hand shakes the ornament back and forth, causing the small boat inside to sway along with the movement.

[2-8] The scene switches to the same ornament on a car dashboard. The liquid and the boat inside the ornament are shaking as the car moves. Through the windshield, it can be seen that it is raining outside. There is a white car driving on the left side, and there are green trees and some parked cars on both sides of the street.
